title: BeezUP
description:
# The REST API of BeezUP system
## Overview
The REST APIs provide programmatic access to read and write BeezUP data. 
Basically, with this API you will be able to do everything like you were with your browser on https://go.beezup.com !

The main features are:
- Register and manage your account
- Create and manage and share your stores with your friends/co-workers.
- Import your product catalog and schedule the auto importation
- Search the channels your want to use
- Configure your channels for your catalogs to export your product information:
    - cost and general settings
    - category and columns mappings
    - your will be able to create and manage your custom column
    - put in place exlusion filters based on simple conditions on your product data
    - override product values
    - get product vision for a channel catalog scope
- Analyze and optimize your performance of your catalogs on all yours channels with different type of reportings by day, channel, category and by product.
- Automatize your optimisation by using rules!
- And of course... Manage your orders harvested from all your marketplaces:
    - Synchronize your orders in an uniformized way
    - Get the available actions and update the order status
- ...and more!

## Authentication credentials
The public API with the base path **/v2/public** have been put in place to give you an entry point to our system for the user registration, login and lost password. The public API does not require any credentials.
We give you the some public list of values and public channels for our public commercial web site [www.beezup.com](http://www.beezup.com).

The user API with the base path **/v2/user** requires a token which is available on this page:
https://go.beezup.com/Account/MyAccount

## Things to keep in mind
### API Rate Limits
- The BeezUP REST API is limited to 100 calls/minute.

### Media type
The default media type for requests and responses is application/json. Where noted, some operations support other content types. If no additional content type is mentioned for a specific operation, then the media type is application/json.

### Required content type
The required and default encoding for the request and responses is UTF8.

### Required date time format
All our date time are formatted in ISO 8601 format: 2014-06-24T16:25:00Z.

### Base URL
The Base URL of the BeezUP API Order Management REST API conforms to the following template.

https://api.beezup.com

All URLs returned by the BeezUP API are relative to this base URL, and all requests to the REST API must use this base URL template.

You can test our API on https://api-docs.beezup.com/swagger-ui\
You can contact us on [gitter, #BeezUP/API](https://gitter.im/BeezUP/API)

GetChannelsIndex.title: Get public channel index
GetChannelsIndex.description: Use this operation to get the correct link to the channels and to the list of values

GetChannels.title: The channel list for one country

GetPublicListOfValues.title: Get the list of values related to this list name

Login.title: Login
Login.description: User Login - The login will give your tokens

LostPassword.title: Lost password
LostPassword.description: Lost password - Your password will be regenerated and sent to your email

Register.title: User Registration
Register.description: User Registration - Create a new user on BeezUP

AnalyticsIndex.title: Get the Analytics API operation index

GetTrackingStatus.title: Get the global synchronization status of clicks and orders
GetTrackingStatus.description:
Clicks and orders are eventually consistent. \
This operation gets the current global state of projections.

AnalyticsStoreIndex.title: Get the Analytics API operation index for one store

OptimiseAll.title: Optimise all products
OptimiseAll.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
Apply the operation on every product related to this request. \
This operation is used at the bottom of the analytics page result.

OptimiseByCategory.title: Optimise products by category
OptimiseByCategory.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
This operation will reenable or disable products's category for every channel indicated in the body.

OptimiseByChannel.title: Optimise products by channel
OptimiseByChannel.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
Apply the operation on every product on this channel.

OptimiseByProduct.title: Optimise product
OptimiseByProduct.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
This operation will reenable or disable this product for every channel indicated in the body.

Optimise.title: Optimise products by page
Optimise.description:
/!\ WARNING /!\ \
Apply the operation on every product related to this request. \
This operation is used at the bottom of the analytics page result.

GetReportFilters.title: Get report filter list for the given store

GetRules.title: Gets the list of rules for a given store

RunRules.title: Run all rules for this store

GetStoreTrackedExternalOrders.title: Get the latest tracked external orders

GetStoreTrackingStatus.title: Get the synchronization status of clicks and orders of a store
GetStoreTrackingStatus.description:
Clicks and orders are eventually consistent. \
This operation gets the current state of projections for a store.

CatalogIndex.title: Get the index of the catalog API
CatalogIndex.description: The operation will give you all the operations you will be able to do and all the LOV used in this API.

Catalog_GetBeezUPColumns.title: Get the BeezUP columns
Catalog_GetBeezUPColumns.description: Get the BeezUP columns, this columns are used for mapping during the manual catalog importation process.

CatalogStoreIndex.title: Get the index of the catalog API for this store
CatalogStoreIndex.description: The operation will give you all the operations you will be able to do on this store for this API.

Importation_ActivateAutoImport.title: Activate the auto importation of the last successful manual catalog importation.
Importation_ActivateAutoImport.description: Once you have made your fist manual catalog importation with success, you can call this operation to import it automatically. No parameter required, we know which one it is.

Catalog_ComputeExpression.title: Compute the expression for this catalog.

Catalog_SaveCustomColumn.title: Create or replace a custom column

Catalog_GetCustomColumnExpression.title: Get the encrypted custom column expression

Importation_GetReportings.title: Get the latest catalog importation reporting

Importation_GetDetectedCatalogColumns.title: Get detected catalog columns during this importation.

Importation_MapCatalogColumn.title: Map catalog column to a BeezUP column

Importation_ConfigureRemainingCatalogCol.title: Configure remaining catalog columns
Importation_ConfigureRemainingCatalogCol.description: This operation should be used after you have mapped the required BeezUP Columns

Importation_GetCustomColumns.title: Get custom columns currently place in this importation

Importation_SaveCustomColumn.title: Create or replace a custom column

Importation_GetCustomColumnExpression.title: Get the encrypted custom column expression in this importation

Importation_MapCustomColumn.title: Map custom column to a BeezUP column

Importation_GetProductSample.title: Get the product sample related to this importation with all columns (catalog and custom)

Importation_GetProductSampleCustomColumn.title: Get product sample custom column value related to this importation.
Importation_GetProductSampleCustomColumn.description: /!\ Use this operation only when you just changed the custom column expression and you want to get a precise the property value. Otherwise use the operation Importation_GetProductSample which will give you all property values

Catalog_GetRandomProducts.title: Get random product list
Catalog_GetRandomProducts.description: We will return 10 products randomly selected with all product values

GetChannelCatalogs.title: List all your current channel catalogs

GetChannelCatalogExclusionFilterOperator.title: Get channel catalog exclusion filter operators

GetChannelCatalogProductByChannelCatalog.title: Get channel catalog products related to these channel catalogs

DisableChannelCatalogCategoryMapping.title: Disable a channel catalog category mapping

ReenableChannelCatalogCategoryMapping.title: Reenable a channel catalog category mapping

GetChannelCatalogProductInfoList.title: Get channel catalog product information list

ExportChannelCatalogProductInfoList.title: Export channel catalog product information list

DisableChannelCatalogProduct.title: Disable channel catalog product
DisableChannelCatalogProduct.description:
By default a all your catalog products are exposed to the channel.
You can disable a product by using this operation.
/!\ In case of massive optimisation we recommand you to use the analytics api

GetChannelCatalogProductValueOverrideCop.title: Get channel catalog product value override compatibilities status

ConfigureChannelCatalogProductValueOverr.title: Copy channel catalog product value override

DeleteChannelCatalogProductValueOverride.title: Delete a specific channel catalog product value override

ReenableChannelCatalogProduct.title: Reenable channel catalog product
ReenableChannelCatalogProduct.description:
By default a all your catalog products are exposed to the channel.
You can reenable a product by using this operation.
/!\ In case of massive optimisation we recommand you to use the analytics api

GetAvailableChannels.title: List all available channel for this store

GetCustomerIndex.title: The index of all operations and LOV

CreateContract.title: Create a new contract
CreateContract.description: Now you are ready to create your contract. Before that, please ensure that you check the offer with the same request parameterts. /offers

TerminateCurrentContract.title: Schedule termination of your current contract at the end of the commitment.
TerminateCurrentContract.description: By default your contract are automatically renew. By calling this operation you can disable the auto renewal.

ReactivateCurrentContract.title: Reactivate your terminated contract.
ReactivateCurrentContract.description: By calling this operation you can re-enable the auto renewal.

GetOffer.title: Get offer pricing
GetOffer.description: Get the offer pricing then you can create your contract with the same request parameters. /v2/user/customer/contracts

Logout.title: Log out the current user from go2
Logout.description: Log out the current user from go2

UpdateStore.title: Update some store's information.
UpdateStore.description: Update some store's information. FYI, you cannot change the country.

SaveStoreAlerts.title: Save store alerts
SaveStoreAlerts.description: You just have to send the alert you want to update, does not need all alerts. (PARTIAL UPDATE ACCEPTED)

GetStoreShares.title: Get shares related to this store

ShareStore.title: Share a store to another user

DeleteStoreShare.title: Delete a share of a store to another user

GetUserListOfValues.title: Get the list of values related to this list name

GetMarketplaceChannelCatalogs.title: Get your marketplace channel catalog list

GetPublications.title: Fetch the publication history for an account, sorted by descending start date

GetChannelCatalogMarketplaceProperties.title: Get the marketplace properties for a channel catalog

GetChannelCatalogMarketplaceSettings.title: Get the marketplace settings for a channel catalog

SetChannelCatalogMarketplaceSettings.title: Save new marketplace settings for a channel catalog
SetChannelCatalogMarketplaceSettings.description:
Allow you to configure your marketplace settings.
Partial update accepted.

GetOrderIndex.title: Get all actions you can do on the order API

GetAutomaticTransitions.title: Get list of configured automatic Order status transitions

ConfigureAutomaticTransitions.title: Configure new or existing automatic Order status transition

ChangeOrderList.title: Send a batch of operations to change your marketplace Order information (accept, ship, etc.)
ChangeOrderList.description: The purpose of this operation is to reduce the amount of request to the API.

ClearMerchantOrderInfoList.title: Send a batch of operations to clear an Order's merchant information (max 100 items per call)
ClearMerchantOrderInfoList.description: The purpose of this operation is to reduce the amount of request to the API.

SetMerchantOrderInfoList.title: Send a batch of operations to set an Order's merchant information  (max 100 items per call)
SetMerchantOrderInfoList.description: The purpose of this operation is to reduce the amount of request to the API.

GetOrderExportations.title: Get a paginated list of Order report exportations

ExportOrders.title: Request a new Order report exportation to be generated
ExportOrders.description: A new file will be generated containing a summary of all the Orders matching the requested filter settings.

HarvestAll.title: Send harvest request to all your marketplaces

GetOrderListFull.title: Get a paginated list of all Orders with all Order and Order Item(s) properties
GetOrderListFull.description:
The purpose of this operation is to reduce the amount of request to the API.\
\
Previous implmentation of this feature only returned a partial (light) version of the Orders. The purpose of this API is to reduce the number of incoming requests by returning the complete (full) Order and Order Item(s) properties.

GetOrderListLight.title: Get a paginated list of all Orders without details

GetMarketplaceAccountsSynchronization.title: Get current synchronization status between your marketplaces and BeezUP accounts

GetOrder.title: Get full Order and Order Item(s) properties

HeadOrder.title: Get the meta information about the order (ETag, Last-Modified)
HeadOrder.description:
The purpose of this operation is to reduce the bandwith usage by getting just the meta information about the order (ETag, Last-Modified) with the body.
This could be useful

HarvestOrder.title: Send harvest request for a single Order

GetOrderHistory.title: Get an Order's harvest and change history

ChangeOrder.title: Change your marketplace Order Information (accept, ship, etc.)
